meanings.definition: The act of exciting or the state of being excited.
meanings.sent1: The excitation of the crowd at the concert was contagious.
meanings.sent2: The excitation of the children on the playground was evident.
meanings.sent3: The excitation of the puppy when its owner returned was heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The excitation in the air before a surprise party is palpable.
meanings.sent5: The excitation of the students before the school trip was overwhelming.

meanings.sent1: The movie was full of exciting excitations that kept the audience engaged.
meanings.sent2: The roller coaster ride provided thrilling excitations for the riders.
meanings.sent3: The excitation of trying a new adventurous sport can be exhilarating.
meanings.sent4: The excitation of a new idea can spark creativity in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The excitation of a good book can transport you to different worlds.
